name: io.github.elevenlabs/elevenlabs-mcp
description: MCP server that enables interaction with Text to Speech, Voice Agents and audio processing APIs

environment_variables.description: The base path for the MCP server. Defaults to $HOME/Desktop if not provided.
environment_variables.name: ELEVENLABS_MCP_BASE_PATH

environment_variables.description: The optional data residency region. Defaults to 'us' if not provided.
environment_variables.name: ELEVENLABS_API_RESIDENCY

environment_variables.description: The output mode for the MCP server. Defaults to 'files' if not provided.
environment_variables.name: ELEVENLABS_MCP_OUTPUT_MODE
